Description:
UNIQUE COASTAL PROPOSITION
UNIQUE COASTAL PROPOSITION
110 ACRES (44.5ha) approx
Where The River Meets The Sea
Frontage To Both
Lifestyle Property En Route Phillip Island.
If you are looking for a coastal retreat,
something distinctly different
where an abutting boat ramp allows
direct bay access from the meandering
Bass River.
If you have the foresight
to look past the present and
appreciate the features of
this remarkable precinct
and this exclusive sizeable
parcel of land hosting both a
Westernport Bay and riverfront.
You should consider this!
We are seeking an imaginative
entrepreneur, willing to roll
up their sleeves and take up the
challenge.
Existing infrastructure - fencing,
Rundown original 4 bedroom dwelling,
Various shedding in poor condition.
o 7 Titles (not available individually)
o Zoned Farming
This land can also be viewed on www.yourlandshop.com.au

Description:
Foreshore Block North Facing Corinella
Set in a fantastic area of Corinella in a much sought-after location, is an absolutely outstanding opportunity here to acquire this beautiful block of approx 700 sqm.
One of the last water front blocks available for purchase in Corinella.
The land offers unrivalled foreshore and rural views of Western Port Bay & French Island.
Moorings Place Corinella offers a relaxed lifestyle, close to the walking tracks, convenient access to boat ramp and jetty, Corinella Community Park, Community Tennis court and the Community Town Centre.
This thriving community is only - 40 Minutes to the world-famous GP track, Penguin parade and much more, including a great life style.
Don't miss out on one of the most affordable foreshore property’s remaining in the Corinella area.
Daniel & Tamara from @realty Bass Coast have the pleasure of presenting this magnificent property in Moorings Place Corinella

Description:
A YOUNG HOME IN GREAT LOCATION!!!
The property is perfectly positioned within walking distance to local shops, which consists of permanent doctor, chemist, bank, ambulance depot and cafes, as well as easy highway access.
This immaculate young home on a manageable block of 604 sq.m. is located in quiet neighbourhood. The home itself offers 3 good size bedrooms all with wall to wall carpet and built in robes, master having split-system air conditioner, walk-in-robe and ensuite, open plan living with natural light, kitchen with excellent appliances, attractive tiled floor, split-system air conditioner, meals area with sliding door to large entertainment deck, family bathroom with full bath, good size laundry and internal door to double garage with remote door. Other features include solar panels, garden shed, fruit trees, vegie gardens, caravan/trailer area, fenced off backyard and pathway to shops. This is a home that you can simply move in and enjoy.
Major shopping centre and Phillip Island approximately 25 minutes. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
SOLID FAMILY HOME - 16 Malcolm Drive Grantville
This Country Coastal inspired home has everything needed for enjoying beautiful sun-drenched afternoons with the family. The open plan style kitchen, along with ample storage space, also offers an open living area. The garden offers bay views from the back yard.and
The location offers an unsurpassed Bass Coast lifestyle opportunity and is perfect for the family.
With the beach just beyond your back yard, this property offers loads of potential.
This thriving community is only - 45 Minutes to the world-famous GP track, Penguin parade and much more, including a great life style.
Daniel & Tamara from @realty Bass Coast have the pleasure of presenting this magnificent property in Grantville

Description:
RELAXED LIFESTYLE BY SEASIDE!!
ACT NOW to secure this brick rendered home in much sought after village of Corinella. Set on a spacious 1,100 sq.m. corner block and comprising separate living area with large split-system air conditioner, spacious meals/kitchen with large pantry and electric cooking, sliding door to paved outside area, 3 good size bedrooms all with built in robes, master having ensuite, good size family bathroom and laundry. The home has plenty of natural light and a very warm feeling as soon as you step through the appealing entry. If you love plenty of space and have all those extra vehicles, this great size block will fit it all, plus there is 3 driveways, double carport, good size garage/shed with concrete floor/powered and the property is fully fenced.
Only minutes to 24 hour boat ramp, shop, v-line, school bus stops and scenic coastal walks. Good commute to CBD with dual lane highway and approximately 25 minutes to major shopping centre and Phillip Island.

Description:
Privacy, Tranquility and Bay Views
Nestled amongst carefully sought Australian natives is this rare opportunity to own your own slice of peace and quiet. This 4 acre property will leave you feeling like you live in your own private nature reserve, perfect for the kids to roam and explore, letting imagination run wild. Sit back and unwind on the deck and watch the sunset over the water, you will truly feel like you're at home.
The home itself offers 3 good-sized bedrooms, serviced by an updated central family bathroom. A home office and second study nook would make working from home an option or the perfect place for the kids to study. Open plan kitchen, living and meals with cozy wood fire and sliding doors onto a private front deck with stunning and tranquil views of Westernport Bay and French Island. The kitchen is perfect for entertaining with huge island bench, ample work space and plentiful cabinetry including pot drawers. Electric appliances, including dishwasher, make cooking a breeze.
Outside are 3 large sheds plus additional wood sheds, 3 water tanks, vege gardens and a carport. A second rear deck with bbq area and pergola sets the scene for summer outdoor living, relaxing and entertaining friends.
Additional features include - Split system heating/cooling 4kw solar system with 16 panels.
This home would suit so many, a family with space to run, a retiree or holiday home. Zoned Low Density Residential there is even the opportunity to subdivide (STCA) into smaller allotments if 4 acres is a little too much for you. Truly, the opportunities here are endless.

Description:
Elevated Home with Storage for Cars, Boat, Caravan or Motor Home
This elevated split level home has Bay views and is packed with features including a recent 8 m x 5 m living room extension plus new carport measuring 19 x 3.6 x 3.5 m high approx.
The home has a new kitchen, bathroom and laundry all with crisp white cupboards, quality appliances and coastal look wood flooring. There is a Rinnai gas space heater/air purifier plus a 5 kw split system to keep you warm in winter and cool in summer. There is a 4.5 KW Solar Panel system, 3 Water tanks connected to irrigation throughout the garden, a 6 x 4.8 m Workshop with power, lighting and plumbing adjacent to the parking area, perfect for home handyman or craft room. Three large bedrooms have built in robes and share the newly renovated bathroom. This home is comfortable, spacious and well finished with extensive concrete paving and established easy care irrigated gardens. There is safe and private fencing with gates offering perfect security for children and pets. Undercover sitting area has a gas point for the bbq and enjoys a nice view over the front yard and fire pit. Bay views are enjoyed from the living areas of this home. Call to book your inspection before this one is snapped up!

Description:
LOVE THE SOUND OF THE SEA?
You won't need to put a shell to your ear to hear the sounds of the waves of Westernport when you build your dream home or getaway on this beautifully located sheltered block of 653m2 (approx.)
With a double storey home built (STCA) you will have incredible views over the Bay and French Island.
This block offers it all - position - potential and price!
- 2 minute walk to beach
- A mere 90 minutes to Melbourne
- 20 minutes to Phillip Island
Be quick for this beauty as land located so close to the water is much sought after.

Description:
Opportunity knocks! Business and residence in one package
Imagine running a business in a friendly tight-knit regional community, and the morning commute is only a few steps from the front door. Currently operating as the Bass General Store, the business and residence has huge potential for anyone seeking a fresh opportunity or life-style change.
The shop is a well-established grocery offering postal and parcel delivery services. Running off solar panels, it is fitted with shelving, air-conditioning and has an adjoining cool room. It can easily be converted into any kind of business … a salon, café, take-away, gift shop or an office. The possibilities are limitless.
Behind the shop is a two-story residence with three bedrooms plus study, two bathrooms and an open plan living space. The living area is equipped with a wood heater to keep you cosy and warm in winter, and reverse cycle air-conditioning for those sultry summer days. The kitchen has ample storage space and an electric cooker.
Set on approximately one acre, the business and residence also comes with a double garage, workshop and wood shed. Additionally, there is potential for building an additional residence on the spacious acre. Backing on to the Bass Highway, the location is very convenient to Phillip Island, Wonthaggi and Inverloch. The beaches of Phillip Island and Coronet Bay are only a ten-minute drive from the front door, and Packenham and Berwick are only 45-minutes by car. Bass is also serviced by V-line buses, which means there is very convenient transport to Melbourne. There is also a school bus service to Newhaven College and Wonthaggi Secondary College, and Bass Valley Primary is only a short drive from the property.
This kind of opportunity only comes along once in a life-time. Take the plunge and live a lifestyle you have always desired. Contact Leanne Poulton on 0437 441 127 to arrange an inspection.
Offering
• Business and residence development opportunity
• Spacious solar-powered shop with fittings and cool room
• Residence with three bedrooms plus study
• Two bathrooms, each with bath and shower
• Kitchen with ample storage and electric cooker
• Cosy living area with wood heater and reverse cycle air-conditioning
• Acre with potential for additional building
• Workshop, wood shed and double garage
• Central township location convenient to transport, local beaches, nearby south-eastern suburbs and Melbourne
• Close to schools on Phillip Island and Wonthaggi

Description:
REDUCED! TITLED LAND 823 M2 - EASTERN SHORES, GRANTVILLE
A titled block in this popular sold out estate has just come to the market and offers a roomy area of 823 m2 with a private 4 m wide battle-axe driveway from Orchid Drive. If you are seeking a titled block you will know how rare this opportunity is. Possible bay views from a double storey home. Eastern Shores Estate is a comfortable 80 minute drive from Melbourne metro and only a short 40 minute commute to the South Eastern suburbs of Dandenong and Pakenham.
Positioned in the heart of the coastal town of Grantville you will enjoy all the lifestyle spoils of pristine beaches, Coastal walking tracks, Boating/Fishing facilities and National parks. Daily living will be a breeze at Eastern Shores Estate with access to Health services, Financial and Educational facilities and Public Transport all at your doorstep. The beach is just across the highway so bring your building plans, pack your thongs and a towel and start dreaming of your new coastal lifestyle.

Address: Unit 3/39 James St Lang Lang VIC 3984
Description:
Partially Renovated
Ideal investment 2 bedroom unit on a block of 3 with side access. Some rooms have been repainted. New down lights and blinds. Kitchen needs finishing off. 2 door pantry, over head cupboards, dishwasher, double sink, electric oven and hotplates. New tiles in kitchen, laundry and bathroom. Separate lounge, split system aircon, newly painted and downlights. All bedrooms fitted with built in robes. Main bathroom has a shower, vanity, bath and tinted windows.
Outside there is a tool shed, large under cover pergola, pattern paved concrete, plants, water tank for garden and power point. Roof restoration and new spouting. 1 car garage.

Description:
COASTAL LIVING WITH BAY & RURAL VIEWS!
This spacious modern home is situated on a large block in a unique location being a no through road to waterfront with native treed surrounds. Offering open plan living and kitchen area with natural light, tiled floors throughout except in bedrooms for easy maintenance, split-system air conditioner , sliding door from living to undercover outdoor deck area, perfect for entertaining and just relaxing and soaking up the views and tranquil setting with farmland at rear. There are 3 good size bedrooms all with carpet, ceiling fans and b/i/r/s, master with walk-in and en suite, family bathroom has full bath and separate shower and good size laundry. The home has a charming feel as soon as you walk through the front door. The backyard is fenced and has plenty of space, 2 gardens sheds and established gardens. Stroll to the beach and enjoy the beautiful scenic coastal walks on offer . Only minutes to a 24 hour boat ramp, shop, primary school , kindergarten and there is a school bus stop at corner.

Description:
SEASIDE ESCAPE - BRICK UNIT
Spacious and comfortable fully furnished (optional), 3 bedroom brick unit approx.. 500 metres to shops and cafes. Large open plan living, meals and kitchen area with neutral tones, 2 bedrooms have full wall of BIRs , generous size family bathroom with full bath and laundry with storage space. Additional features include split-system, downlights, wall heaters in all bedrooms, carport, back deck and private courtyard. Stroll down to the beach. Permanent doctor, chemist and ambulance depot all nearby. Enjoy as a permanent residence or holiday retreat. This property is ideal for single person or couple looking for a
small block with low maintenance and privacy. Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 38 kms.

Description:
CHARACTER FILLED MODERN HOME/HALF ACRE!!
What a wonderful opportunity to secure an excellent lifestyle.
A well treed and private sanctuary awaits, comprising of good shedding, a 3 bedroom home with loads of character, expansive deck areas, a bungalow with ensuite and situated on a brilliant half acre parcel of land.
The home consists of 3 large bedrooms with robes, two spacious living zones, semi access ensuite, laundry and well appointed kitchen.
Outside is a lock up garage for the car with workshop, separately fended rear paddock and a secure pen for the chooks.
Some extra features: - Reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Wood fire
- Ceiling fans
- Gas cooking
- Dishwasher
The home is 18 years of age, very well cared for and a quality build.
For weekly up-dates, including addresses of properties or more information, join our Buyers Club, visit: www.pbe***

Description:
5 Bedrooms on Approx 1/4 Acre
This 5 bedroom timber home on 1004m2 (Approx Qtr Acre block), bullnosed verandah surrounds the front of the home.
Master robes and ensuite with triple shower, glass bricks, toilet and vanity. Spacious family and dining room with raised ceilings, airconditioner, ceiling fan and wood heater. New floating floors, daddo walls, storage room and lined cupboard.
Modern kitchen, which was replaced a few years ago. Featuring a pantry, pot draws and lots of bench space, electric stove and dishwasher. Double French doors leading out to an undercover verandah. Large rumpus room/2nd living room also with ceiling fan. Main bathroom has a bath, vanity and beautiful tiles throughout. All bedrooms are good sized.

Description:
Brand New Turn-key House & Land Package
Lot 25 Brazier Street, Grantville - 450.4m2 Approx
Under construction - 4 Bedroom Family house & land package with remote control garage. 2 separate living areas, kitchen/meals/living, a lounge room and a large alfresco URL. Master with full ensuite and walk in robe, all remaining bedrooms have D.BIR's. Inclusions for home: Dishwasher, electric stainless steel hot cooking appliances, aluminium windows, holland blinds, fly screens, TV antenna and Brivas split system air conditioning. Tiles to the wet areas, quality carpets, fold down clothes line, grass turf to front yard, topsoil and seeded to rear yard. This home is a turn key package. Inspect today before it's too late!

Description:
LARGE FARM READY FOR YOUR TOUCH
View our short film about this property at the link below:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Ld4utbytgI
At a huge 487 acres, "Teio Park" is one of the largest single holdings on the Island.
It also boasts one of the best water supplies on the island, taking the worry out of a likely long summer! Comprising 2 houses in a fully fenced yard, large shearing shed, tool shed, machinery shed, large hay shed, chicken shed, cattle yards, enclosed vegetable garden, good perimeter fencing and numerous dams, makes it ideal for many farming pursuits including cattle, sheep,horses, or take advantage of the water-supply and soil quality for a wide variety of agricultural/horticultural uses. You could even establish an eco-tourism business S.T.G.A. Only a few kms from the passenger ferry, the property is conveniently located near the general store and primary school with varied landscapes including natural undulations, many tree varieties, paddocks and approx 80 acres of fully fenced, pristine natural bush providing fantastic habitat to a myriad of wildlife including many birds, echidnas and koalas, all adjacent to the French Island National Park!
The road frontage and long driveway lends itself to subdivision into four lots (S.T.G.A), with no need for new Road construction. Ideal for multiple family holding and being bigger overall than some suburbs, the opportunities are many! Secure your very own chunk of island paradise, all without council rates!
Contact Phil Bock on 0438 497 715 for appointment to inspect.

14 Month Old 5 Bedroom Home

Beautiful kitchen aesar stone bench tops, pantry, 900W electric cook top, electric oven, dishwasher and overhead cupboards. Down lights, tiles in kitchen, family room, hallway and wet areas. Rumpus room with a double linen cupboard. 16 solar panels, 5.3KW system. 2 car garage under roof line. Concrete slab outside family room. Plan available.

CORNER BLOCK - GREAT LOCATION!
Investment coastal block approx. 671 sqm. within walking distance to cafes, shops, doctor, ambulance depot beach and v-line bus service. Situated in quiet new development area. Subdividable into 2 lots S.T.C.A. this block is a future investment. Description:
Outstanding Bay Views on Acreage
This beautifully presented home is on a lovely 3 acre allotment set among stunning established gardens in an unbelievably select location at The Gurdies offering stunning views of Westernport and French Island. This home offers 3 large bedrooms, a good sized lounge and an absolutely wonderful kitchen which has been recently upgraded including a magnificent island bench and meals area. The family bathroom has been stylishly renovated. Character plus on offer with high ceilings with timber exposed beams, a coonara fire, under slab heating and an 18 solar panel solar system.There is a 2nd lounge which could be converted into another bedroom or study. Outside there is plenty of vehicle accommodation with double garage and double carport and there is also a dam on the property. This is a rare chance to grab a picturesque property, so don't delay, arrange an inspection today!
